What once was one, now is two.
	
	And together we will blast you!

skillTree.localised_description: Even the Scribes have favourites among the scrolls.

skillTree.localised_description: The cackling never ends, and you'll know not if it's two or a thousand maniacal voices raised in mockery!

skillTree.localised_description: While not exactly masterful agents of great cunning or skill, a boundless supply of esoteric magic makes up for many shortcomings.

skillTree.localised_description: Xirat'P and P'tarix are not fleeting constructs driven to find entertainment or combust. No, they are surly and cunning combatants with years of experience.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fly.
This unit can fire while on the move.
When this unit casts a spell, all of their spells will be randomly replaced by another spell.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases when nearby allies or enemies cast spells.

items.colour_text: These cracked and jumbled scrolls contain details of every spell ever written â€“ though finding the correct one at the opportune moment can be something of a challenge.
